text: Hello! I am the PBR VITS Assistant. How can I help you today regarding PBR Visvodaya Institute of Technology and Science?

PBR Visvodaya Institute of Technology and Science (PBR VITS) is a private engineering and management institution established in 1998 in Kavali, Andhra Pradesh. It operates under Visvodaya Educational Society and offers undergraduate and postgraduate programs.
PBR VITS is located at Visvodaya Campus, Udayagiri Road, Kavali, Nellore District, Andhra Pradesh, India.
You can view the exact location of PBR VITS on Google Maps here: https://www.google.com/maps/search/?api=1&query=PBR+Visvodaya+Institute+of+Technology+and+Science+Kavali
PBR VITS is affiliated with Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University Anantapur (JNTUA). It is approved by AICTE and accredited by NAAC.
B.Tech programs are 4 years (8 semesters). M.Tech, MBA, and MCA programs are generally 2 years.
The institution follows JNTUA regulations under a semester-based academic system, typically aligned with CBCS (Choice Based Credit System).
PBR VITS offers B.Tech programs in CSE, ECE, EEE, Mechanical Engineering, Civil Engineering, AI & ML, and IoT. It also offers MBA, MCA, and M.Tech programs.
The Computer Science and Engineering (CSE) department focuses on programming, AI, machine learning, data science, cloud computing, and software development with modern computer labs.
The Electronics and Communication Engineering (ECE) department focuses on communication systems, VLSI design, embedded systems, digital electronics, and signal processing.
The Electrical and Electronics Engineering (EEE) department focuses on power systems, electrical machines, renewable energy systems, and control engineering.
The Mechanical Engineering department includes thermodynamics, manufacturing processes, machine design, and workshop practice.
The Civil Engineering department focuses on structural engineering, environmental engineering, construction technology, and surveying.
The AI & ML specialization focuses on deep learning, neural networks, data analytics, and intelligent system development.
The IoT specialization focuses on embedded systems, smart devices, sensors, and automation technologies.
B.Tech admissions are through AP EAPCET counseling. M.Tech admissions require PGECET or GATE. MBA and MCA admissions are based on AP ICET.
The approximate total B.Tech tuition fee ranges between ₹1.6–₹1.8 lakhs. PG program fees vary depending on specialization.
The Placement Cell conducts campus recruitment training, aptitude sessions, mock interviews, and placement drives. Recruiters include TCS, Wipro, Infosys, Tech Mahindra, and other companies.
The campus includes academic blocks, modern laboratories, computer centers, library, seminar halls, hostels, and transport facilities.
Departments have subject-specific laboratories including Programming Labs, Digital Electronics Labs, Communication Labs, Electrical Machines Labs, CAD Labs, and Workshop Labs.
The central library provides textbooks, reference books, journals, and digital learning resources.
Separate hostel facilities are available for boys and girls with essential amenities and mess facilities.
Transport services are available for students from nearby towns and villages.
Eligible students may receive government scholarships and fee reimbursement schemes as per Andhra Pradesh regulations.
Semester exams, internal assessments, supplementary exams, and results are conducted as per JNTUA regulations and published on the official website.

The institution has statutory committees including Anti-Ragging Committee, Internal Complaints Committee (ICC), Grievance Redressal Cell, SC/ST Cell, Women Protection Cell, and Internal Quality Assurance Cell (IQAC).
Students can access academic information, attendance, and results through institutional or university online portals.
For official contact information, please visit the official website https://pbrvits.ac.in/.
Official social media links are available in the footer section of the official website https://pbrvits.ac.in/.
The official website of PBR VITS is https://pbrvits.ac.in/ where admissions, placements, results, and academic notifications are published.
